definition[0]: a feeling of respect for someone, or a good opinion of someone
example[0]: The critics held him in high esteem as an actor.
example[1]: Please accept the small gift we enclose as a mark of our esteem.
example[2]: my father’s complete lack of esteem for actors
definition[1]: to respect and admire someone or something
example[3]: Peden was greatly esteemed by the people of Ayrshire.
example[4]: He was esteemed as a literary wit.
